alert.note: Alert for Hocking; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 1:23PM EDT until July 06 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hocking County in central Ohio... East central Ross County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 123 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Kingston, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Londonderry, Laurelville, Adelphi, South Bloomingville, Mooresville and Hallsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
